attributes.description:
We at KIA RANDBURG pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check,  DEKRA roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. We believe in EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. We will tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We have In-House finance options with all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly assist you in making your dreams come TRUE.

EXTRAS 
42 Ltr Long Range garvity fed fuel tank
Rock Sliders
OLD MAN EMU SHOCKS
Scuff plate
Armidillo Cover
